name: Aaron Allen
summary: Full Stack Developer with 9+ years of experience designing, developing, and deploying scalable web and cloud-native applications. Skilled in Golang, Java/JVM, React, Angular, and Node.js, with additional experience in Python for AI/ML integration using FastAPI, TensorFlow, and PyTorch. Experienced in building high-performance, secure, and testable systems, implementing unit, integration, and end-to-end testing, and optimizing application performance through caching, query tuning, asynchronous processing, and gRPC-based communication. Adept at CI/CD automation with GitHub Actions and Azure DevOps, Agile methodologies, and mentoring junior engineers, delivering enterprise-grade solutions in fast-paced environments.
skills: React.js | React Native | Angular | Next.js | TypeScript | JavaScript | Material UI | React Hook Form | jQuery | Node.js | Express.js | Golang (Gin, Fiber) | Java (Spring Boot) | JVM Ecosystem | FastAPI | Python | gRPC | RESTful APIs | GraphQL | PostgreSQL | MongoDB | SQL Server | Redis | TensorFlow | PyTorch | NumPy | Pandas | Scikit-learn | AI-powered search | Predictive analytics | Jest | React Testing Library | Cypress | xUnit | Integration Testing | End-to-End Testing | Unit Testing | Caching strategies | Asynchronous processing | Query optimization | Application profiling | Azure DevOps | GitHub Actions | Docker | CI/CD pipelines | Cloud deployment automation | Agile/Scrum | Jira | Confluence | Git (GitHub, GitLab, Bitbucket) | Team mentoring | Cross-functional collaboration

experience.title: Sr. Software Engineer
bullets: Architected and delivered full-stack systems using Golang (Gin, Fiber) and Java (Spring Boot) for backend services, with React and Angular frontends, and Node.js for auxiliary services.

Designed and maintained polyglot microservice architectures, using Golang for latency-sensitive cloud-native services and Java/JVM for transaction-heavy workloads, integrating gRPC for internal service communication.
Built high-performance REST/GraphQL APIs backed by PostgreSQL, MongoDB, and Redis, including schema design, indexing strategies, cache optimization, and service orchestration.
Developed AI-powered features using Python, FastAPI, TensorFlow, and PyTorch, implementing predictive analytics, recommendation engines, and intelligent search functionality.
Implemented unit, integration, and end-to-end testing with Go testing framework, Jest, React Testing Library, Cypress, and xUnit, ensuring production stability and reliability.
Optimized application performance through caching, asynchronous processing, query tuning, and backend profiling, reducing latency across services.
Developed and maintained CI/CD pipelines using GitHub Actions and Azure DevOps, enabling automated multi-environment deployments and cloud-native orchestration.
Participated in architecture design and code reviews, collaborating with product and QA teams to ensure modular, maintainable, and scalable systems.
Mentored junior engineers and contributed to team best practices, including coding standards, design patterns, Agile processes, and service-level documentation.

experience.title: Senior Developer
bullets: Developed and maintained full-stack applications with Golang and Node.js backend services, React.js frontend, and gRPC for internal service-to-service communication.
Built RESTful APIs and Java-based microservices, handling request validation, authentication flows, and core business logic.
Designed and optimized relational and non-relational data models in PostgreSQL and MongoDB, improving performance for high-volume workflows.
Implemented unit and integration testing using Go testing framework, Jest, Mocha, and Chai, increasing test coverage and reducing production defects.
Collaborated with designers and product stakeholders to implement functional UI components and backend services.
Used Docker, Git, environment-based configurations, and CI workflows for reliable builds and cloud deployments.

experience.title: Associate Software Engineer
bullets: Contributed to internal and customer-facing applications using AngularJS, jQuery, Node.js, and Java-based backend modules under senior developer supervision.
Assisted in backend development using Golang and Java, implementing REST endpoints and supporting business logic for user and workflow features.
Worked with MySQL and MongoDB for CRUD operations, data modeling, and query optimization.
Participated in debugging and maintenance activities to improve stability and resolve QA-reported issues.
Used Git for version control and collaborated within an Agile/Scrum team, participating in sprint planning, code reviews, and estimations.
